Description:
Tomoyuki Itamura (板村 智幸 Itamura Tomoyuki) is a Japanese animator, director, and storyboard artist previously associated with Shaft. He had been the director of every Monogatari TV anime adaptation ever since Nisemonogatari, taking the place of Tatsuya Oishi as he worked on Kizumonogatari for upwards of 6 years.  
After directing the final cour of Owarimonogatari, he left to work with other studios; having directed The Case Study of Vanitas (2021) as well as Call of the Night (2022).
